EmailTemplate.name: Website Auth - Charged (check list first)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: {!Case.Subject}.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for reaching out to the outfitter team.
We are working on processing your return credit. The standard time frame to see this reflected on your original form of payment is 7-10 business days.
If we can help with any other questions, please let us know as we are happy to assist.
The YETI Outfitters 512.394.9384 customerservice@yeti.com yeti.com
